title: Authors and Citation
text: Andrew McInerney. Author, maintainer. Kevin Burke. Author.

title: Authors and Citation
text: McInerney , Burke K (2023). statnn: Statistically-Based Neural Networks. https://github.com/andrew-mcinerney/statnn, https://andrew-mcinerney.github.io/statnn/.
code: @Manual{,   title = {statnn: Statistically-Based Neural Networks},   author = {Andrew McInerney and Kevin Burke},   year = {2023},   note = {https://github.com/andrew-mcinerney/statnn, https://andrew-mcinerney.github.io/statnn/}, }

title: Statistically-Based Neural Networks
text: package currently development. experience issues, please get touch.

title: Statistically-Based Neural Networks
text: can install development version statnn GitHub :
code: # install.packages("devtools") devtools::install_github("andrew-mcinerney/statnn")

title: Statistically-Based Neural Networks
text: primary function package statnn(). creates statistically-based object existing neural network object. Currently supports neural networks nnet, neuralnet, keras, ANN, torch. useful summary table can generated using covariate-effect plots can created using information functions arguments can found documentation.
code: library(statnn) stnn <- statnn(object) summary(stnn) plot(stnn, conf_int = TRUE)

what: Perform delta method for a function FUN to calculate associated uncertainty — delta_method
title: Perform delta method for a function FUN to calculate associated uncertainty — delta_method
text: Perform delta method function FUN calculate associated uncertainty

title: Perform delta method for a function FUN to calculate associated uncertainty — delta_method
code: delta_method(   W,   X,   y,   q,   ind,   FUN,   alpha = 0.05,   x_r = c(-3, 3),   len = 301,   lambda = 0,   response = "continuous",   ... )

title: Perform delta method for a function FUN to calculate associated uncertainty — delta_method
text: W Weight vector X Data y Response q Number hidden units ind index column plot FUN function delta method alpha significance level x_r x-axis range len number breaks x-axis lambda Ridge penalty. Default 0. response Response type: "continuous" (default) "binary" ... additional arguments FUN

title: Perform delta method for a function FUN to calculate associated uncertainty — delta_method
text: Effect input

title: Selects hidden layer structure — hidden_node_sel
text: Performs either bulk step-wise hidden node selection.

title: Selects hidden layer structure — hidden_node_sel
code: hidden_node_sel(   X,   y,   Q,   n_init,   type = "bulk",   inf_crit = "BIC",   task = "regression",   unif = 3,   maxit = 1000,   ... )

title: Selects hidden layer structure — hidden_node_sel
text: X Matrix covariates y Vector response Q Candidate number hidden nodes n_init Number random initialisations (tracks) type Selection type: "bulk" (default) "step" inf_crit Information criterion: "BIC" (default), "AIC" "AICc" task "regression" (default) "classification" unif Random initial values max value maxit maximum number iterations nnet (default = 100) ... additional argument nnet

title: Selects hidden layer structure — hidden_node_sel
text: Optimal number hidden nodes

what: Determines the importance of each input — input_importance
title: Determines the importance of each input — input_importance
text: Calculates importance input model based information criterion returns node least important

title: Determines the importance of each input — input_importance
code: input_importance(   X,   y,   q,   n_init,   inf_crit = "BIC",   task = "regression",   unif = 3,   addition = FALSE,   X_full = NULL,   maxit = 1000,   ... )

title: Determines the importance of each input — input_importance
text: X Matrix covariates y Vector response q Number hidden nodes n_init Number random initialisations (tracks) inf_crit Information criterion: "BIC" (default), "AIC" "AICc" task "regression" (default) "classification" unif Random initial values max value addition Switch addition step (default FALSE) X_full Full matrix covariates X dropped maxit maximum number iterations nnet (default = 100) ... additional argument nnet

title: Determines the importance of each input — input_importance
text: least important input node

title: Selects input layer structure — input_node_sel
text: Performs either bulk step-wise input node selection.

code: input_node_sel(   X,   y,   q,   n_init,   type = "bulk",   inf_crit = "BIC",   task = "regression",   unif = 3,   X_full = NULL,   maxit = 1000,   ... )

title: Selects input layer structure — input_node_sel
text: X Matrix covariates y Vector response q Number hidden nodes n_init Number random initialisations (tracks) type Selection type: "bulk" (default) "step" inf_crit Information criterion: "BIC" (default), "AIC" "AICc" task "regression" (default) "classification" unif Random initial values max value X_full Full matrix covariates X dropped maxit maximum number iterations nnet (default = 100) ... additional argument nnet

Default 0. response Response type: "continuous" (default) "binary" ... additional arguments FUN

Fits various tracks (different random starting values) and chooses best model

Fits various tracks (different random starting values) and chooses best model

Fits various tracks (different random starting values) and chooses best model

code: plotnn(   x,   rep = NULL,   x.entry = NULL,   x.out = NULL,   radius = 0.15,   arrow.length = 0.2,   intercept = FALSE,   intercept.factor = 0.4,   information = TRUE,   information.pos = 0.1,   col.entry.synapse = "black",   col.entry = "black",   col.hidden = "black",   col.hidden.synapse = "black",   col.out = "black",   col.out.synapse = "black",   col.intercept = "black",   col.sig.synapse = "black",   col.insig.synapse = "lightgrey",   col.sig.node = "black",   col.insig.node = "lightgrey",   fontsize = 12,   dimension = 6,   show.weights = FALSE,   file = NULL,   rounding = 3,   alpha = 0.05,   lambda = 0,   ... )

title: Plot method for neural networks — plotnn
text: x object class statnnet rep repetition neural network. rep="best", repetition smallest error plotted. stated repetitions plotted, separate window. x.entry x-coordinate entry layer. Depends arrow.length default. x.x-coordinate output layer. radius radius neurons. arrow.length length entry arrows. intercept logical value indicating whether plot intercept. intercept.factor x-position factor intercept. closer factor 0, closer intercept left neuron. information logical value indicating whether add error steps plot. information.pos y-position information. col.entry.synapse color synapses leading input neurons. col.entry color input neurons. col.hidden color neurons hidden layer. col.hidden.synapse color weighted synapses. col.color output neurons. col..synapse color synapses leading away output neurons. col.intercept color intercept. col.sig.synapse color significant synapses. col.insig.synapse color insignificant synapses. col.sig.node color significant input nodes. col.insig.node color insignificant input nodes. fontsize fontsize text. dimension size plot inches. show.weights logical value indicating whether print calculated weights synapses. file character string naming plot write . stated, plot saved. rounding number decimal places round values. alpha significane level. lambda ridge penalty. ... arguments passed methods, graphical parameters (see par).

title: Neural network model selection — selectnn
text: ... arguments passed methods X Matrix covariates y Vector response Q Candidate number hidden nodes n_init Number random initialisations (tracks)` inf_crit Information criterion: "BIC" (default), "AIC" "AICc" task "regression" (default) "classification" unif Random initial values max value maxit maximum number iterations nnet (default = 100) formula formula form: response ~ x1 + x2 + ... data Data frame variables specified formula taken

title: Neural network model selection — selectnn
text: list information optimal model. W_opt - vector selected weights. value - value "inf_crit" selected model. nn_hidden - list hidden node selection results. nn_input - list input node selection results. n_rep_h - number hidden node selection steps. n_rep_i - number input node selection steps. X - matrix important covariates found. X_full - matrix covariates. dropped - vector unimportant covariates. hidden_size - vector hidden layer size found step.
